data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of WeWork India Management Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from October 10 2025 the equity shares of WeWork India Management Ltd (Scrip Code: 544570) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251009-58 dated October 09 2025.
